events.title: Sunday Morning Meditation
events.description:
The The Social Sangha Sunday Morning Meditation group¬†will gather for a combination of silent sitting and walking meditation.

Schedule

10:00-10:30 sitting meditation

10:30-10:45 walking meditation

1045-11:15 sitting meditation

11:15-11:30 brief sharing

Other Details

Access to community and wisdom should be available to everyone, so all sangha events are offered for free. Following ancient buddhist practice, we collect danƒÅ. DanƒÅ is a Pali word that denotes a special kind of giving. It means ‚Äúgenerosity‚Äù or ‚Äúgiving freely. DanƒÅ is a practice of a mutual exchange of generosity and abundance. It develops lovingkindness and compassion, deepens awareness of our interconnectedness and encourages non-attachment. If this kind of giving is available to you, there will be a donation box at this event.

Inclement Weather Notice: In case of adverse weather conditions that may make it unsafe to drive: Please check our website (thesocialsangha.com) to see if the event has been cancelled.

events.title: Wine in Winter Wonder at Marked Tree Vineyard
events.description:
Wine in Winter Wonder at Marked Tree is a month-long celebration beginning the day after Thanksgiving, on November 28, and running through January 5.

Marked Tree invites you to the winery for an enchanting evening experience unlike any other. Each night, the estate is transformed into a modern, illuminated holiday landscape, featuring over 6,000 twinkling lights. Guests are invited to either drive or stroll through the property, taking in the beauty of the season beneath star-filled skies. Along the way, savor award-winning wines and the serene atmosphere of winter in the mountains. Whether you‚Äôre a wine enthusiast or simply looking for a magical holiday outing, Marked Tree is where joy and wonder come together under the open sky.

To complement the holiday season, the winery is proud to present a festive¬†Music in the Vines series¬†in collaboration with the Hendersonville Symphony. Join the fun on select Fridays and Saturdays for live performances that blend beautifully with the ambiance of the vineyard.¬†For the full lineup and ticket information, please visit our website.

events.title: Reggae Sunday with Chalwa
events.description:
Chalwa¬†Reggae Sunday¬†at French Broad River Brewery happens every week from 3pm-6pm! It‚Äôs the perfect way to round out each weekend. You‚Äôll find yourself drifting away to the sounds of reggae music surrounded by good people and great beer. Reggae Sunday is fun for the whole family!

This 8-member Mountain Reggae powerhouse packs it full of roots meditations and high grade jams that awaken your spirit and soul! Chalwa‚Äôs high energy shows are one of a kind, featuring smooth vocals, percussion, bass, lead guitar, keys and saxophone. Their extensive collection of original music is interlaced with music from some of the Greats including, Bob Marley, Peter Tosh, Burning Spear, Bunny Wailer and even Jerry Garcia and the Grateful Dead.

events.title: Winter Lights
events.description:
Winter Lights

November 15, 2025 ‚Äì January 4, 2026

6:00 ‚Äì 10:00 p.m.

Winter Lights is a spectacular open-air¬†walk-through light show¬†made from¬†over one million lights! Located at the North Carolina Arboretum in Asheville, North Carolina, this year‚Äôs event features favorites like the famously tall 50-foot lighted tree and the Quilt Garden, along with enchanting new details designed to delight and surprise.

Troll sightings are anticipated at this year‚Äôs Winter Lights, as six of Dambo‚Äôs Trolls will be experiencing the show for themselves. Meet them in the gardens at Winter Lights!

Learn more and purchase tickets here
